718497f-a.title: Manhattan: Central Park West - 81st Street
718497f-a.text:
Clearing after demolition of the Beresford. A new building with the same name will be erected on the site.
October 28, 1928.
P. L. Sperr, Photographer.
718497f-a.folder: Central Park West & 81st Street, Manhattan, NY

718497f-b.folder: Central Park West & 81st Street, Manhattan, NY

714608f-a.title: Manhattan: 81st Street (West) - Central Park West
714608f-a.text:
West 81st Street, at, adjoining and west of the N.W. corner of Central Park West (right), as photographed from the grounds surrounding the Museum of Natural History. Shown are several new apartment buildings and the older, the more distinctive Hotel Beresford. The latter is at Central Park West.
July, 1931

George L. Balgue, photo
714608f-a.folder: 81st Street (West) & Central Park West, Manhattan, NY

714608f-b.title: Manhattan: 81st Street (West) - Central Park West
714608f-b.text:
West 81st Street, at, adjoining and west of the N.W. corner of Central Park West (right), as photographed from the grounds surrounding the Museum of Natural History. Shown are several new apartment buildings and the older, the more distinctive Hotel Beresford. The latter is at Central Park West.
July, 1931

George L. Balgue, photo
714608f-b.folder: 81st Street (West) & Central Park West, Manhattan, NY

718266f-a.title: Manhattan: Central Park West - 81st Street
718266f-a.text:
Central Park, Mall: The Esplanade, Bethesda Fountain, and the eastern bay of the Lake, seen from the terrace at the 72nd Street cross drive. Buildings on Cetral Park West, from the new Beresford at 81st Street to the El Dorado at 91st Street, are shown on the horizon at the left. The small tower, with the flag flying, seen on the center horizon over the trees, is the Belvedere, a castle at one corner of the former Lower Reservoir.
May 17, 1933.
P. L. Sperr.
718266f-a.folder: Central Park West & 81st Street, Manhattan, NY

3 West 81st Street, at and adjoining the N.W. corner of Central
Park West.
1914.

718492f-a.title: Manhattan: Central Park West - 81st Street (West)
718492f-a.text:
(1)
The Beresford apartments located at Central Park West between W.81st and 82nd Streets,from a view looking westwards across the Park.
(2)
Fifth Avenue looking across Central Park from the East Side, in the evening sun.
(3)
The Municipal Building at Park Row and Centre Street,from St.Paul's Chapel on Broadway.(Fulton
to Vesey Streets.)
No date.
Hannan,Photographer,
416 W.57th Street,
New York City.
718492f-a.folder: Central Park West & 81st Street (West), Manhattan, NY
